#Text= Banished servant says : " It is the day of your coronation .

column1: #Text=" Azula says : " Yes , it is .
#Text=So , please .
#Text=Tell me why , on the most important day of my life , you 've decided to leave a pit in my cherry ?
#Text=" Banished servant says : " It was n't a decision ; it was just a small mistake .
#Text=" Azula says : " Small ?
#Text=Do you realize what could 've happened if I had n't sensed the pit in time ?
#Text=" Banished servant says : " I suppose you could 've ... choked ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Yes , then you will understand the severity of your crime .
#Text=" Banished servant says : " I understand , Princess .
#Text=Please , forgive me .
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh very well , since it is a special day , I will show mercy .
#Text=You are banished .
#Text=Leave this palace immediately .
#Text=" Azula says : " What are you all looking at ?
#Text=I have two feet that need scrubbing .
#Text=And make sure you get in between the toes .
#Text=I wo n't have my first day as Fire Lord marred by poor foot hygiene .
#Text="
